articles.title: Russia-Ukraine war: Buhari calls for increased gas partnership with Portugal - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: The President, Major General Muhammadu Buhari (retd.), on Thursday in Lisbon, said Nigeria could become Portugal and Europe’s major supplier of natural gas, especially on the backdrop of the Russia-Ukraine crisis which had skewed supply to the region.

articles.author: Jane Patterson, Katie Scotcher
articles.title: New Zealand and European Union secure historic free trade deal - RNZ
articles.description: More than 91 percent of tariffs will be removed the day the deal comes into effect, while the value of NZ exports to the EU are estimated to increase by $1.8b a year by 2035.
articles.content:
New Zealand and the European Union have struck an historic free trade deal, "unlocking access to one of the world's biggest and most lucrative markets" after four years of tough negotiating.

articles.title: UK must ‘get Brexit done’, says Maroš Šefčovič - BreakingNews.ie
